A suite of modules that enhance your Ruqqus browsing experience

+RuqqusPlus is a community-driven unofficial extension for Ruqqus. It adds features like:

Infinite Scroll
Save Posts
Tag Users
Open Posts In a Popup
Sidebar Enhancements
Better Media Handling
Any many more features!

+RuqqusPlus is developed independently, and is not officially endorsed by or affiliated with Ruqqus.
